contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Izumi'''|和泉村|Izumi-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Ōno District, Fukui|Ōno District]], [[Fukui Prefecture|Fukui]], [[Japan]]. On November 7, 2005 Izumi was merged into the city of [[Ōno, Fukui|Ōno]]. As of 2003, the village had an estimated [[population]] of 701 and a [[population density|density]] of 2.11 persons per km². The total area was 332.38 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.ono.fukui.jp/ Ōno official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Fukui Prefecture]] {{Fukui-geo-stub}}
